findings.quote: The US working age population is 205-215 million people.
findings.issue: Range provided without specifying year or source for verification

findings.quote: The average hourly wage in the US is $25-35.
findings.issue: Wide range without specifying mean, median, or data source

findings.quote: Typical full-time work is 1800-2000 hours per year.
findings.issue: Range presented without defining "typical" or distribution

findings.quote: Income elasticity of labor supply from lottery studies is -0.05 to -0.15.
findings.issue: Confidence intervals and sample sizes not specified for estimates

findings.quote: The US GDP was $27 trillion in 2023.
findings.issue: No specification of nominal vs real GDP or quarter referenced
